result.execSummary:
The defendant was charged with both OWI (4th w/in 5 yrs) [Modifiers: Penalty - Operating While Under the Influence (4th w/in 5 yrs)] and Operating w/ PAC (4th w/in 5 yrs) [Modifiers: Penalty - Operating While Under the Influence (4th w/in 5 yrs)]. The defendant was found guilty of OWI (4th w/in 5 yrs) [Modifiers: Penalty - Operating While Under the Influence (4th w/in 5 yrs)] and the other charge, Operating w/ PAC (4th w/in 5 yrs) [Modifiers: Penalty - Operating While Under the Influence (4th w/in 5 yrs)] was dismissed by the court.

  • Adam J Halvorson was found guilty of OWI (4th w/in 5 yrs) [Modifiers: Penalty - Operating While Under the Influence (4th w/in 5 yrs)], a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 346.63(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Comply with treatment.  Count 2 dismissed.  14TR7582 dismissed.

miscConds.notes: $65.00 Blood Draw Reimbursement fee paid.  $250.00 DNA surcharge paid.

timeConds.notes:
Huber privileges subject to jail policies.  May serve in Dane County under E.M.P.  Good time applies.  12-07-2015  Judge Voigt suspends huber privileges from 12-4-15 to 12-31-15 and imposes loss of all good time.  5-20-2016 Judge Voigt reinstates good time.
Consecutive to: Any other sentence.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: On Motion to Restore Good Time in15CF462.

Defendant Adam J Halvorson by video, in custody with attorney John David Hyland.  Troy Cross appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Cases called: 15CF462 and 14CT363.  Atty Hyland gave statement to court.  State objected to motion with argument.  Court granted the Motion in 15CF462 good time is reinstated.  14CT363 time is served.  Order signed by Court.
Motion hearing on May 20, 2016 at 02:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Adam J Halvorson
Current: 403 Jackson Street, Columbia County Jail, Portage, WI 53901 United States  (Effective: 05-11-2016)
Prior: 546 Kelvington Dr #C, Sun Prairie, WI 53590 United States
from Atty John Hyland with Motion to Restore Good Time and letter from defendant in support thereof.
Judge ordered loss of huber from 12-4-15 to 12-31-15 and imposed loss of all good time.

ADA Crystal Long appeared for State of Wisconsin.  Defendant appeared in person with Atty John Hyland.  Complaint filed, reading waived.  14CT363 is dismissed - refiled as felony 15CF462. Attorney rights.  Preliminary waiver filed; rights.  Probable cause found, bound over for this proceeding.  Information filed.  Counts remain same, reading waived.  Rights/elements.   Ct 1, OWI, Ct 2 dismissed.  Sentence withheld, 3 years probation,  6 months jail with huber consecutive to any other sentence. May serve in Dane County under E.M.P.     $3214.00 paid, 36 month revocation/36 month interlock upon licensure/$65 Blood Draw Reimbursement to Sheriff, AODA and comply.  DNA sample and $250.00 Surcharge.  Not possess/consume alcohol.   Good time applies. 14TR7582 dismissed.   Post conviction filed.  4:11 pm/4:32
